complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the microsite template development into subtasks covering design and implementation of each section (header, hero, about, testimonials, featured listings, market stats, interactive map, FAQ, contact form, footer), responsive design, lazy loading, animations, and reusable components.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task involves multiple distinct UI sections with varied functionality, responsive design requirements, performance optimizations like lazy loading, and reusable component creation. This breadth and integration complexity justify a high complexity score and a detailed breakdown into subtasks for focused development and testing.
